pkgmetadata.longdescription: Common Code for the 'AMPED' and 'PIMPLE' 'shiny' Apps for Stakeholder Engagement and Harvest Strategies // A collection of common code for the 'AMPED' and 'PIMPLE' 'shiny' applications for stakeholder engagement in developing fisheries harvest strategies. The package is not that useful on its own but provides common functionality including plots, stochasticity options, life history options and a simple surplus production model.
